title: Bug 49299: Incorrect behavior with custom cookie name in Servlet 3.0 ch.7.1.1
description: The information provided in Servlet 3.0 ch.7.1.1 regarding the effect of a custom cookie name on URL rewriting is incorrect.
OB: The Servlet 3.0 ch.7.1.1 incorrectly states that a custom cookie name affects URL rewriting.
EB: Instead of using the custom cookie name as specified, the current implementation in the trunk uses the default 'jsessionid' for URL rewriting.
SR: To reproduce this issue, follow these steps: 1. Deploy the attached war file named 'cookiename.war'. 2. Access http://localhost:8080/cookiename/.
